snippet: The well-regarded Miami City Ballet selected Lourdes Lopez, a Cuban-born former principal of New York City Ballet, as the successor to the artistic director, Edward Villella.
abstract: The well-regarded Miami City Ballet selected Lourdes Lopez, a Cuban-born former principal of New York City Ballet, as the successor to the artistic director, Edward Villella.

headline.main: Lourdes Lopez Named New Director of Miami City Ballet
